summary.label:
Safe driving can add up to savings with TD MyAdvantage.

By clicking "Install", you consent to the installation of the TD MyAdvantage app provided by TD Insurance* and to any future updates or upgrades. You are also acknowledging that you understand that the TD MyAdvantage app and any future updates and upgrades will or may perform the functions described below. You may withdraw your consent at any time by deleting the TD MyAdvantage app from your device.

What is the TD MyAdvantage program?

The TD MyAdvantage program is a usage-based insurance savings program that is 100% voluntary and free! It's designed to reward safe driving behaviour - the safer you drive, the more you could save. The data collected will only be used to calculate your potential savings.

TD MyAdvantage rewards safe drivers based on individual driving behaviours. Using a technology called telematics, it allows actual driving habits to be analyzed and measured.

The TD MyAdvantage app is free to download, however standard wireless carrier message and data rates may apply.

How does it work?

If you’re a TD Insurance auto customer, saving is easy:

1. Contact a TD Insurance Representative at 1-866-223-1030 to enroll in the TD MyAdvantage program and receive a unique Activation Code.
2. Log in with your code and start driving. The app will capture your driving data on each trip, including GPS locations, mileage and driving style elements such as speed, acceleration, cornering and braking.
3. This information will be used to create your personalized driving score.
4. This score is used to calculate discounts that could be applied to your premium when it’s time to renew your policy, and suddenly safe driving makes even more cents.

Benefits of enrollment:

• Get a discount of 10% (5% in Quebec) on your insurance premium just for enrolling in TD MyAdvantage, and potentially save up to 25%** on renewal.
• Encourage all drivers on your policy to adopt safe driving habits by getting them to enroll in the TD MyAdvantage program.

Additional app features:

• Safer driving habits – get helpful driving tips and advice based on your current driving habits, so you can continue to drive safely and possibly earn a discount on your premium when it’s time to renew.
• Earn badges - badges are fun awards you can earn through the app by meeting challenges designed to help you become a safer driver. The better you drive the more badges you can earn!

Important Disclosures:

The TD MyAdvantage app collects the following data for each trip you make:
• GPS data (location information, speed)
• Acceleration, speeding, braking and cornering derived from GPS or accelerometer data
• Time of day
• Confirmation of when the app is being turned on and off
• Mobile device ID
• Mileage
• Battery level and charging status
• Bluetooth and Wi-Fi connection information
• Internet connectivity (Cellular or Wi-Fi)

Please note: TD MyAdvantage uses your phone's GPS services. Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

Your driving data is used to calculate your driving score. Your data is then securely transmitted to the app to display scores.

Need help?

If you experience problems with the TD MyAdvantage app you can call 1-866-223-1030, Monday to Friday 8:00 am to 10:00 pm and Saturday 9:00 am to 6:00 pm EST.

If you require assistance, contact us by phone at 1-866-223-1030, or by mail at TD CASL Office, Toronto Dominion Centre, PO Box 1, Toronto, ON, M5K 1A2 or by e-mail at service@tdinsurance.com.

The Bitcoin.com Wallet, trusted by millions, is an easy-to-use, multichain, self-custodial crypto wallet that puts you in full control of all your crypto holdings.

It allows you to:

- Buy Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Ethereum (ETH), Avalanche (AVAX), and select ERC-20 tokens quickly and easily via credit card, Apple Pay, and more.
- Sell BTC, BCH, ETH, AVAX, and select ERC-20 tokens into your local currency (in select regions).
- Send, receive, and swap between BTC, BCH, ETH, AVAX, USDT, USDC, and a huge range of ERC-20 tokens.
- Access DeFi apps that enable use cases like earning interest on your crypto, borrowing and lending, participating in NFT marketplaces, synthetic assets, and more.

Other key features include:

SELF-CUSTODIAL

Your cryptoassets are ultra-secure because only you can access them. Self-custodial means not even Bitcoin.com has access to your funds, and you can easily port your assets to another crypto wallet whenever you want. No lock-ins, and you'll never again ask for permission to use *your* money.

DEFI READY

Connect to Ethereum and Avalanche DApps via WalletConnect. That means you can earn interest on your crypto, trade using decentralized exchanges, participate in NFT marketplaces, access lending markets and much, much more.

QUICK & SECURE ACCESS

Unlock your Wallet app with biometrics or PIN.

AUTOMATED BACKUP

Conveniently back up all your wallets to the cloud and decrypt them with a single master password. Replace the hassle of managing numerous secret phrases with the convenience and security of a single custom password. (You can still opt to manually manage your individual seed phrases).

CUSTOMIZABLE FEES

You decide the network fee. Up the fee for faster network confirmations. Lower it when you're not in a rush. Bitcoin.com takes ZERO fees (you pay only to use the public blockchain networks).

LOW-FEE CHAINS

The multichain [Bitcoin.com](http://Bitcoin.com) Wallet is committed to giving you access to low-fee public blockchains so that you can use peer-to-peer cash as it was intended AND make the most of the opportunities available in the web3 space. 

AVALANCHE SUPPORT
Now you can buy, sell, swap, hold and manage AVAX, the native token of the Avalanche blockchain. 

SHARED WALLETS (MULTI-SIG)

Create multi-signature wallets to manage funds with your team or friends and family.

WIDGETS

Install live market-data widgets on your home screen. Track BTC, BCH, ETH, AVAX and your favorite ERC-20 tokens throughout your day.

MARKETS VIEW
Track the price action and get key info on the top cryptocurrencies.

PERSONAL NOTES

Add text to your transactions to remind you who sent what, when, and where.

SEND VIA SOCIAL

For BCH, thanks to low network fees and near-instant confirmation time, you can send a payment link (aka "Sharable Link") to anyone using any channel (eg. Messenger, SMS, email, Whatsapp, and so on.). Funds are received/claimed instantly with just one click.

INSTANTPAY

Set your spending threshold, then scan a QR code with the request amount set on the recipient's device. Your payment will complete in an instant (BCH only).

DISCOVER

Use the Discover section in the app to locate merchants near you who accept cryptocurrency payments in-store. Browse websites where you can checkout with crypto and find other cool features like games, gift cards, and more.

CUSTOMIZABLE DISPLAY CURRENCY

Choose your preferred display currency alongside your crypto (eg. USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, CAD, AUD, and more).

ORGANIZE YOUR HOLDINGS

Create any number of wallets to organize your funds as you see fit. Drag and drop to re-order your wallets, and hide wallet balances that you don't want prying eyes to see.

AUDITED BY KUDELSKI SECURITY

A comprehensive 2022 audit from the renowned cybersecurity experts proved there is no real-world scenario in which an attacker would be able to compromise a user’s private keys.
